name: Fill Form
description: Fill out form fields in a form-builder or other form component. Provide field name-value mappings and optionally submit the form. Supports text inputs, textareas, select dropdowns, checkboxes, and radio buttons.

componentId.description: The ID of the form component (e.g., 'contact-form', 'user-settings'). This is the module ID assigned when the component was rendered.

fields.description: Field name to value mapping. Keys are field names (or data-field attributes), values are the data to fill. Example: { "email": "user@example.com", "age": "25", "subscribe": true }

submit.description: Whether to submit the form after filling fields (default: false). If true, looks for submit button or triggers form submission.
